thread.title: Asian Shares Rally on Hopes for Longer Period of Low Rates
thread.title_full: Asian Shares Rally on Hopes for Longer Period of Low Rates - WSJ

author: Chao Deng
title: Asian Shares Rally on Hopes for Longer Period of Low Rates
text:
Markets across Asia rallied Friday after details from the U.S. central bankâ€™s latest meeting cast further doubt on the prospect of higher interest rates this year.
Hopes for easier monetary policies from global central banks have been building, spurring gains earlier this week in shares and emerging-market currencies that were pummeled by fears of capital flight.
